pageHeader.title: About Konectr
pageHeader.subtitle: We're on a mission to get people off their phones and into real life.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: It started with a simple observation: we're more connected than ever, yet lonelier than ever before.
story.paragraph2: Every day, millions of people scroll through social media, collecting likes and followers, but feeling increasingly isolated. We've traded real conversations for comments, genuine friendships for follower counts.
story.paragraph3: We asked ourselves: What if there was a better way?
story.paragraph4: What if technology could be a bridge to real-world connection, not a replacement for it? What if instead of showing you what others are doing, an app could help you do things with others?

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Get people off their phones and into real life
mission.subtitle: We're building the anti-social network. An app designed to be used less, so you can live more.

values.title: What We Believe
values.subtitle: These values guide everything we build

realConnection.title: Real Connection
realConnection.description: We believe genuine friendships happen face-to-face, not through screens.

spontaneity.title: Spontaneity
spontaneity.description: Life's best moments are unplanned. We make it easy to be spontaneous.

safetyFirst.title: Safety First
safetyFirst.description: Every user is verified. Every venue is vetted. Your safety is our priority.

inclusiveCommunity.title: Inclusive Community
inclusiveCommunity.description: Everyone belongs. We're building a space where all people can find their tribe.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.subtitle: Be part of the community that's bringing real connection back.
